intro: Psychotria lilacina, commonly known as the lilac psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, fragrant flowers that range in color from white to lilac. Its leaves are typically elliptical and have a smooth texture. Psychotria lilacina is often found in moist, shaded environments within tropical forests.
